animal.question: I say 'Meow,' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ Some people keep me as a pet

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I love to chase balls.
🐕 I am a very good boy!

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🐥 My babies are called ducklings.

animal.question: I'm big and gray and have a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I live in Africa and Asia.
💦 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I'm a farm animal that says 'Moo!' and gives milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in a field.
🐄 I have black and white spots.
🥛 I produce milk for humans to drink

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. I have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat orange vegetables.
🐰 I have soft fur.
🐾 I can move very quickly

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my head.
🦁 I am a cat, but much bigger.
🐾 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I'm a reptile with a shell on my back. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat lettuce and other greens.
🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.

animal.question: I can fly high in the sky and build my nest in trees. I can sing beautifully. What am I?

hints.text: 🪶 I have feathers all over my body.
🐦 I eat seeds and insects.
🎼 I make a melodic sound

animal.question: I am a black and white striped animal that lives in Africa and looks like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me hide from predators.
🌿 I eat grass.
🐎 I am related to horses and donkeys.

ocean.question: I wave but I have no hands. Fish live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am very big and blue!
🚢 Boats like to sail on me.
🐠 Many creatures call me home.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm known for my slow pace.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥗 Sometimes people eat me as escargot.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can also squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can change color to hide.
8️⃣ Count my arms!

ocean.question: I am a very large fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🦈 Some people are afraid of me.
🌊 I live in the ocean and hunt for food.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. I am often small and bright. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I'm often found in groups.
🌈 My colors help me blend in.
🧱 I live in a coral city.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean and loves to jump and play. People think I am very smart. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I communicate with clicks and whistles.
🤸 I love to do tricks!
💨 I breathe air through a blowhole.

ocean.question: I am a large sea creature with a hard shell and pincers. I walk sideways. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I scuttle along the seafloor.
🦞 Some of my relatives are delicious to eat.
🔪 My claws can pinch!

ocean.question: I am a very big whale with baleen instead of teeth. I eat tiny shrimp called krill. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am one of the largest animals on Earth.
filter Feeder I eat tiny creatures by the mouthful.
🎶 I sing beautiful songs in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a sea creature that looks like a plant, but I am an animal. I have tentacles that can sting. What am I?

hints.text: 〰️ I drift with the ocean currents.
😖 Be careful, I can sting!
🔮 I have many different shapes and sizes.

ocean.question: I am a small, hard object found inside some oysters. People use me to make jewelry. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 I can be made into a pretty necklace.
🌊 I'm a treasure from the sea.
🐚 I'm created inside a shell.
